lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 28 -- The British tonight released the figures of four months' sinkings covering the Battle of the Mediterranean -- that curious and smaller editior of the Battle of the Atlantic, with the roles reversed.
abstract: Brit rept on Axis ships sunk since Aug 1
